General.Name: Jiangsu Xinning Modern Logist
General.Description: Henan Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated logistics and supply chain management services in China. The company offers front-end logistics services, including vendor managed inventory, distribution centers, full and bulk/semi- bulk services; factory logistics services, such as on-line warehouse management and raw material distribution services, finished products warehouse management services, etc.; back-end logistics, comprising finished products, funding mode, customer service spare parts; and support services, which include domestic and international freight, bank supervision warehouses, and supply chain financial services. It also provides vehicle navigation satellite positioning, transportation, and telecommunication services; trades in commodities; sells hardware products; and develops software. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Henan Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd. in July 2022. Henan Xinning Modern Logistics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.
General.Address: No. 760, Sunshine West Road, Kunshan, China, 215326
